trait.name: Aggressive
entries: Como acción adicional, el anarca puede moverse hasta su velocidad hacia una criatura hostil que pueda ver.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: El anarca inflige el doble de daño a objetos y estructuras.

action.name: Spiked Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de daño penetrante, o 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de daño penetrante si se usa a dos manos.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: La habilidad innata de lanzamiento de hechizos del arconte es Sabiduría (salvación de hechizos {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} para golpear con ataques de hechizos). El arconte puede lanzar de forma innata los siguientes conjuros, que no requieren componentes materiales:

trait.name: Eye of the Law
entries: Como acción adicional, el arconte puede apuntar a una criatura que pueda ver en un radio de 120 pies y determinar qué leyes ha infringido esa criatura en las últimas 24 horas.

trait.name: Mount
entries: Si el arconte no está montado, puede utilizar una acción de bonificación para teletransportarse mágicamente a la criatura que le sirve de montura, siempre que el arconte y su montura estén en el mismo plano de existencia. Cuando se teletransporta, el arconte aparece a horcajadas sobre la montura, junto con cualquier equipo que lleve puesto. Mientras esté montado y no {@condition incapacitated}, el arconte no puede ser sorprendido, y tanto él como su montura ganan ventaja en las tiradas de salvación de Destreza. Si el arconte queda reducido a 0 puntos de vida mientras está montado en su montura, ésta también queda reducida a 0 puntos de vida.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El arconte hace dos ataques de Martillo de la Justicia.

action.name: Hammer of Justice
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de daño por apaleamiento más 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de daño de fuerza. Si el objetivo es una criatura, debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de {@dc 18} Fuerza o ser derribado {@condition prone}.

action.name: Pacifying Presence
entries: Cada criatura a elección del arconte que éste pueda ver en un radio de 120 pies debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de Sabiduría {@dc 18}, o de lo contrario el objetivo deja caer cualquier arma que esté sosteniendo, termina su concentración en cualquier hechizo u otros efectos, y se convierte en {@condition charmed} por el arconte durante 1 minuto. La criatura {@condition charmed} puede repetir la tirada de salvación al final de cada uno de sus turnos, terminando el efecto sobre sí misma si tiene éxito. Si la tirada de salvación de una criatura tiene éxito o el efecto termina para ella, la criatura es inmune a la Presencia Pacificadora del arconte durante las siguientes 24 horas.

legendary.name: Rejoin Mount
entries: Si el arconte no está montado, se teletransporta mágicamente a su corcel y lo monta siempre que el arconte y su corcel estén en el mismo plano de existencia.

legendary.name: Smite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: El arconte hace un ataque de Martillo de la Justicia, y luego su montura puede usar su reacción para hacer un ataque de arma cuerpo a cuerpo.

legendary.name: Detention (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: El arconte apunta a una criatura que pueda ver en un radio de 60 pies. El objetivo debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de Carisma {@dc 18} o ser teletransportado mágicamente a un semiplano inofensivo hasta el final del siguiente turno del arconte, tras lo cual el objetivo reaparece en el espacio que dejó o en el espacio desocupado más cercano si ese espacio está ocupado.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: El fénix arclight no provoca un ataque de oportunidad cuando vuela fuera del alcance de un enemigo.

trait.name: Grounded Lightning
entries: La primera vez en un turno que el fénix arclado toca el suelo, recibe 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de daño de fuerza.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: El fénix arclight arroja luz brillante en un radio de 15 pies y luz tenue en 15 pies adicionales.

trait.name: Lightning Form
entries: El fénix arclight puede moverse por un espacio tan estrecho como 1 pulgada de ancho sin apretarse. Una criatura que toque al fénix o lo golpee con un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo mientras esté a 5 pies de él recibe 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de daño por rayo. Además, el fénix arclight puede entrar en el espacio de una criatura hostil y detenerse allí. La primera vez que entra en el espacio de una criatura en un turno, esa criatura recibe 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de daño por rayo.

trait.name: Crackling Death
entries: Cuando el fénix arclight muere, explota. Cada criatura en un radio de 30 pies debe realizar una tirada de salvación de {@dc 18} Destreza, recibiendo 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de daño por rayo si falla la tirada de salvación, o la mitad de daño si tiene éxito. La explosión destruye al fénix, pero deja tras de sí un huevo diminuto y caliente con cáscara de mizzium. El huevo contiene el embrión de un nuevo fénix arclado. Eclosiona cuando está en el área de un hechizo que inflige daño de rayo, o si una criatura toca el huevo y gasta ranuras de hechizo cuyos niveles combinados sean iguales a 13 o más. Cuando eclosiona, el huevo libera un nuevo fénix arclado que aparece en el espacio del huevo.

action.name: Arclight Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} para golpear, alcance de 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d8}) de daño por relámpago, y el relámpago salta del objetivo a una criatura a elección del fénix que pueda ver a 30 pies del objetivo. Esa segunda criatura debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de {@dc 18} Destreza o recibir 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de daño por rayo.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Si Aurelia falla una tirada de salvación, puede elegir tener éxito en su lugar.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Aurelia tiene ventaja en las tiradas de salvación contra hechizos y otros efectos mágicos.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Aurelia realiza tres ataques con su espada larga y utiliza el Liderazgo.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} para golpear, alcance de 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d8 + 8}) de daño cortante, o 13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) de daño cortante cuando se usa a dos manos, más 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de daño radiante.

action.name: Leadership
entries: Aurelia pronuncia unas palabras inspiradoras a una criatura que pueda ver en un radio de 30 pies. Si la criatura puede oírla, puede añadir un {@dice d10} a una tirada de ataque o de salvación que haga antes del comienzo del siguiente turno de Aurelia.

action.name: Warleader's Helix {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 17} para golpear, alcance de 60 pies, una criatura. {@h}54 ({@damage 12d8}) de daño radiante, y Aurelia puede elegir otra criatura que pueda ver a menos de 3 metros del objetivo. La segunda criatura recupera 27 ({@dice 6d8}) puntos de vida.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Aurelia suma 7 a su CA contra un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo que la golpearía. Para ello, Aurelia debe ver al atacante y estar empuñando un arma cuerpo a cuerpo.

reaction.name: Unyielding
entries: Cuando Aurelia es sometida a un efecto que la movería, la derribaría {@condition prone}, o ambas cosas, puede usar su reacción para no ser movida ni derribada {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Command Allies
entries: Aurelia elige hasta tres criaturas que pueda ver en un radio de 30 pies de ella. Si una criatura elegida puede ver u oír a Aurelia, puede utilizar inmediatamente su reacción para realizar un ataque con arma, con ventaja en la tirada de ataque.

legendary.name: Longsword Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Aurelia hace un ataque con su espada larga.

legendary.name: Frighten Foes (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Aurelia tiene como objetivo hasta cinco criaturas que pueda ver en un radio de 30 pies. Cada objetivo debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de Sabiduría {@dc 25} o ser {@condition frightened} de ella hasta el final de su siguiente turno. Cualquier objetivo a menos de 1,5 metros de Aurelia tiene desventaja en la tirada de salvación.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: El ángel no provoca un ataque de oportunidad cuando vuela fuera del alcance de un enemigo.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: El ángel tiene ventaja en las tiradas de salvación contra hechizos y otros efectos mágicos.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El ángel realiza dos ataques cuerpo a cuerpo. También utiliza Inspiración de campo de batalla.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} para golpear, alcance de 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de daño cortante, u 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de daño cortante si se usa a dos manos, más 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de daño radiante. Si el objetivo está a menos de 1,5 metros de cualquiera de los aliados del ángel, el objetivo recibe 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de daño radiante adicional.

action.name: Battlefield Inspiration
entries: El ángel elige hasta tres criaturas que pueda ver en un radio de 30 pies. Hasta el final del siguiente turno del ángel, cada objetivo puede añadir un {@dice d4} a sus tiradas de ataque y de salvación.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: El biomante es un hechicero símico de nivel 16. Su habilidad de hechizo es Inteligencia (salvación de hechizo {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} para golpear con ataques de hechizo). El biomante tiene preparados los siguientes hechizos de mago:

trait.name: Bolstering Presence
entries: El biomante emana mágicamente energía vital en un radio de 30 pies de sí mismo. Cualquier aliado del biomante que comience su turno allí recupera 5 ({@dice 1d10}) puntos de vida.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: El biomante tiene ventaja en las tiradas de salvación contra hechizos y otros efectos mágicos.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de daño cortante.

trait.name: Feed on Fire
entries: Si el bicho raro recibe daño por fuego de un hechizo u otro efecto mágico, su tamaño aumenta en una categoría. Si no hay suficiente espacio para que el bicho raro aumente de tamaño, alcanza el máximo tamaño posible en el espacio disponible. Mientras el bicho raro sea Grande o mayor, hace chequeos de Fuerza y tiradas de salvación con ventaja. Si el bicho raro comienza su turno con un tamaño Gargantuesco, el bicho raro libera energía en una explosión. Cada criatura en un radio de 30 pies del bicho raro debe hacer una tirada de salvación de Destreza {@dc 12}, recibiendo 28 ({@damage 8d6}) de daño por fuego si falla la tirada de salvación, o la mitad de daño si tiene éxito. La explosión enciende los objetos inflamables de la zona que no se lleven puestos o transporten. El tamaño del extraño pasa a ser mediano.

trait.name: Form of Fire and Water
entries: El raro puede moverse por un espacio tan estrecho como 1 pulgada de ancho sin apretarse. Además, el bicho raro puede entrar en el espacio de una criatura hostil y detenerse allí. La primera vez que el raro entra en el espacio de otra criatura en un turno, esa criatura recibe 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de daño por fuego y se incendia; hasta que alguien realice una acción para apagar el fuego, la criatura incendiada recibe 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de daño por fuego al comienzo de cada uno de sus turnos.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: Una criatura que toque al bicho raro o lo golpee con un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo mientras esté a 5 pies de él recibe 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de daño por fuego.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: El extraño arroja luz brillante en un radio de 30 pies y luz tenue en 30 pies adicionales.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de daño por apaleamiento más 7 ({@damage 2d6} de daño por fuego, o 11 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de daño por apaleamiento más 14 ({@damage 4d6} de daño por fuego si el extraño es Grande o mayor.

monster.name: Blood Drinker Vampire
languages: the languages it knew in life

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El vampiro realiza tres ataques cuerpo a cuerpo, de los cuales sólo uno puede ser un ataque de mordisco.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} para golpear, alcanzar 5 pies, una criatura dispuesta, o una criatura que es {@condition grappled} por el vampiro, {@condition incapacitated}, o {@condition restrained}. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de daño perforante más 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de daño necrótico. Si el objetivo es humanoide, debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de {@dc 15} Carisma o ser {@condition charmed} por el vampiro durante 1 minuto. Mientras {@condition charmed} esté así, el objetivo se encapricha con el vampiro. El máximo de puntos de golpe del objetivo se reduce en una cantidad igual al daño necrótico recibido, y el vampiro recupera puntos de golpe iguales a esa cantidad. La reducción dura hasta que el objetivo termina un descanso largo. El objetivo muere si su máximo de puntos de vida se reduce a 0.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de daño perforante.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de daño contundente. El vampiro también puede agarrar al objetivo (escapar {@dc 14}) si es una criatura y el vampiro tiene una mano libre.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: El vampiro suma 3 a su CA contra un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo que lo golpearía. Para ello, el vampiro debe ver al atacante y estar empuñando un arma cuerpo a cuerpo.

monster.name: Blood Witch
languages: Abyssal plus any one language (usually Common)

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: La habilidad innata de la bruja para lanzar hechizos es Carisma (salvación de hechizos {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} para golpear con ataques de hechizos). La bruja puede lanzar de forma innata los siguientes conjuros, que no requieren componentes materiales:

trait.name: Blood Witch Dance
entries: La bruja puede usar una acción de bonificación para controlar el movimiento de una criatura maldita por su {@spell hex} hechizo que pueda ver a 30 pies de ella. La criatura debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de Carisma {@dc 15} o usar su reacción para moverse hasta 30 pies en una dirección a elección de la bruja.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: La oscuridad mágica no impide la visión oscura de la bruja.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: La bruja realiza dos ataques: uno con su espada larga y otro con su espada corta.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de daño cortante.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de daño perforante.

action.name: Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} para golpear, alcance 20 pies, un objetivo. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) de daño por apaleamiento. Si el objetivo es una criatura, es {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Hasta que el agarre termine, el objetivo es {@condition restrained}, y el gigante no puede usar este ataque contra nadie más.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} para golpear, alcance 60/240 pies, un objetivo. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) de daño por apaleamiento.

reaction.name: Furious Defense
entries: Después de que una criatura que el gigante puede ver reciba daño de un enemigo a menos de 6 metros del gigante, éste realiza un ataque en cadena contra ese enemigo.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Si Borborygmos falla una tirada de salvación, puede elegir tener éxito en su lugar.

trait.name: Poor Depth Perception
entries: Borborygmos tiene desventaja en cualquier tirada de ataque contra un objetivo que esté a más de 30 pies de distancia.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Borborygmos inflige el doble de daño a objetos y estructuras.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Borborygmos puede utilizar su Presencia Espantosa. También realiza dos ataques: uno con su maza y otro con su pisotón.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} para golpear, alcance de 10 pies, un objetivo. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d6 + 7}) de daño contundente. Si el objetivo es una criatura, debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de {@dc 21} Fuerza o ser derribado {@condition prone}.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) de daño por apaleamiento.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} para golpear, alcance 30/120 pies, un objetivo. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) de daño por apaleamiento.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Cada criatura a elección de Borborygmos que se encuentre a menos de 60 pies de él y pueda verlo u oírlo debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de Sabiduría {@dc 17} o convertirse en {@condition frightened} de él durante 1 minuto. La criatura {@condition frightened} puede repetir la tirada de salvación al final de cada uno de sus turnos, terminando el efecto sobre sí misma si tiene éxito. Si la tirada de salvación de una criatura tiene éxito o el efecto termina para ella, la criatura es inmune a la Presencia Espantosa de Borborygmos durante las siguientes 24 horas.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Borborygmos hace un ataque con un arma.

legendary.name: Bellow (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Borborygmos grita amenazadoramente a una criatura que pueda ver en un radio de 60 pies. Esa criatura debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de Sabiduría {@dc 17} o convertirse en un {@condition frightened} de él durante 1 minuto. Si la criatura ya es un {@condition frightened}, se convierte en un {@condition stunned}. Una criatura puede repetir la tirada de salvación al final de cada uno de sus turnos, terminando el efecto sobre sí misma si tiene éxito. Si la tirada de salvación de una criatura tiene éxito o el efecto termina para ella, la criatura es inmune al bramido de Borborygmos durante las siguientes 24 horas.

legendary.name: Wide Berth (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Borborygmos se mueve hasta la mitad de su velocidad y puede atravesar el espacio de cualquier criatura menor que Huge. La primera vez que Borborygmos entra en el espacio de una criatura durante este movimiento, la criatura debe hacer una tirada de salvación de Destreza {@dc 21}. Si la tirada de salvación tiene éxito, la criatura se aleja 5 pies de Borborygmos. Si la tirada de salvación falla, la criatura es derribada {@condition prone} y Borborygmos puede realizar un ataque de pisotón contra ella.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: La habilidad innata de lanzamiento de conjuros del cackler es Carisma (salvación de conjuros {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} para golpear con ataques de conjuro). El cackler puede lanzar de forma innata los siguientes conjuros, que no requieren componentes materiales:

trait.name: Last Laugh
entries: Cuando el cacareador muere, suelta una carcajada moribunda que marca las mentes de otras criaturas cercanas. Cada criatura en un radio de 3 metros del cacareador debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de Sabiduría {@dc 11} o recibir 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de daño psíquico.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: El cacareador puede imitar cualquier sonido que haya oído, incluidas las voces. Una criatura que escuche los sonidos puede saber que son imitaciones con un chequeo de Sabiduría (Percepción) exitoso {@dc 11}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de daño perforante.

action.name: Spiked Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} para golpear, alcance de 10 pies, un objetivo. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de daño cortante.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Los krasis pueden respirar aire y agua.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El krasis realiza dos ataques: uno con su mordida y otro con sus garras.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, una criatura. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de daño perforante.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de daño cortante.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Los krasis pueden respirar aire y agua.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El krasis realiza dos ataques: uno con su mordida y otro con sus garras.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, una criatura. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de daño perforante.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de daño cortante.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Los krasis pueden respirar aire y agua.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El krasis realiza tres ataques: uno con su mordida, otro con sus garras y otro con su cola.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} para golpear, alcance de 10 pies, una criatura. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) de daño perforante.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} para golpear, alcance de 10 pies, un objetivo. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) de daño cortante.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} para golpear, alcance de 15 pies, un objetivo. {@h}33 ({@damage 6d8 + 6}) de daño contundente. Si el objetivo es una criatura, debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de {@dc 19} Fuerza o ser derribado {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: La habilidad innata de la dríade para lanzar hechizos es Carisma (salvación de hechizos {@dc 17}). La dríade puede lanzar de forma innata los siguientes conjuros, que no requieren componentes materiales:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: La dríade tiene ventaja en las tiradas de salvación contra hechizos y otros efectos mágicos.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: La dríade puede comunicarse con las bestias y las plantas como si ellas y la dríade compartieran un lenguaje.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: La dríade realiza tres ataques, utilizando su báculo de vid, su arco largo o ambos.

action.name: Vine Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de daño por apaleamiento. Si el objetivo es una criatura, debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de {@dc 17} Destreza o quedar {@condition restrained} por vides retorcidas durante 1 minuto. Un objetivo {@condition restrained} de este modo puede usar una acción para hacer un chequeo de {@dc 17} Fuerza (Atletismo) o Destreza (Acrobacia), terminando el efecto sobre sí mismo en caso de éxito.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} para golpear, alcance 150/600 pies, un objetivo. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de daño penetrante.

action.name: Summon Mount (1/Day)
entries: La dríade invoca mágicamente una montura, que aparece en un espacio desocupado a menos de 60 pies de la dríade. La montura permanece durante 8 horas, hasta que ella o la dríade mueran, o hasta que la dríade la rechace como acción. La montura utiliza el bloque de estadísticas de un {@creature elk} (ver el Manual de Monstruos) con estos cambios: es una planta en lugar de una bestia, tiene una Inteligencia de 6, y entiende el silvanismo pero no puede hablar. Mientras esté a 1 milla de la montura, la dríade puede comunicarse con ella telepáticamente.

action.name: Suppress Magic {@recharge 5}
entries: La dríade tiene como objetivo un objeto mágico que pueda ver en un radio de 120 pies. Si el objeto mágico no es un artefacto, sus propiedades mágicas se suprimen durante 10 minutos, hasta que la dríade esté {@condition incapacitated} o muera, o hasta que la dríade utilice una acción de bonificación para terminar el efecto.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: La habilidad innata de lanzamiento de hechizos del buscador de explosiones es Inteligencia (salvación de hechizos {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} para golpear con ataques de hechizos). El buscador de explosiones puede lanzar de forma innata los siguientes hechizos, sin requerir más componentes que su equipo Izzet, que no funciona para los demás:

trait.name: Empowered Spell (3/Day)
entries: Cuando el buscador de explosiones tira el daño para un hechizo, puede volver a tirar hasta cuatro dados de daño. Debe utilizar los nuevos dados.

trait.name: Tides of Chaos (1/Day)
entries: El buscador de explosiones realiza una tirada de ataque, un chequeo de habilidad o una tirada de salvación con ventaja.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de daño por apaleamiento, o 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de daño por apaleamiento si se usa a dos manos.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: La habilidad innata de lanzamiento de hechizos del buscador de explosiones es Inteligencia (salvación de hechizos {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} para golpear con ataques de hechizos). El buscador de explosiones puede lanzar de forma innata los siguientes hechizos, sin requerir más componentes que su equipo Izzet, que no funciona para los demás:

trait.name: Counterflux Overcast {@recharge 5}
entries: El buscador de explosiones puede crear un efecto adicional inmediatamente después de lanzar un hechizo. Tira un {@dice d6} para determinar el efecto: 1-3. El buscador de explosiones crea una esfera de 15 pies de radio {@condition invisible} centrada en sí mismo que dura hasta el final de su siguiente turno. Las criaturas en la esfera tienen desventaja en las tiradas de salvación contra hechizos y otros efectos mágicos. 4-6. El buscador de explosiones crea una esfera de 15 pies de radio {@condition invisible} centrada en sí mismo que dura hasta el final de su siguiente turno. Las criaturas en la esfera tienen ventaja en las tiradas de salvación contra hechizos y otros efectos mágicos.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de daño perforante.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: La habilidad innata de lanzamiento de hechizos del ángel es Carisma (salvación de hechizos {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} para golpear con ataques de hechizos). El ángel puede lanzar de forma innata los siguientes conjuros, que no requieren componentes materiales:

trait.name: Exploitation of the Debtors
entries: Como acción de bonificación, el ángel tiene como objetivo una criatura {@condition charmed} a su lado que pueda ver en un radio de 30 pies. El ángel inflige 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de daño necrótico al objetivo, y el ángel gana puntos de golpe temporales iguales al daño infligido.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: El ángel no provoca un ataque de oportunidad cuando vuela fuera del alcance de un enemigo.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: El ángel tiene ventaja en las tiradas de salvación contra hechizos y otros efectos mágicos.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El ángel realiza dos ataques con su guadaña. Puede sustituir uno de estos ataques por Cadenas de Obligación.

action.name: Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} para golpear, alcance de 10 pies, un objetivo. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de daño cortante más 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de daño necrótico.

action.name: Chains of Obligation
entries: El ángel tiene como objetivo una criatura {@condition charmed} a su lado que pueda ver en un radio de 90 pies. El objetivo debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de Carisma {@dc 19} o convertirse en {@condition paralyzed} durante 1 minuto o hasta que reciba algún daño.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: El liche es un hechicero Golgari de nivel 14. Su habilidad de hechizo es Inteligencia (salvación de hechizo {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} para golpear con ataques de hechizo). El lich tiene preparados los siguientes hechizos de mago:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Si el liche falla una tirada de salvación, puede elegir tener éxito en su lugar.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: El liche recupera 10 puntos de vida al inicio de su turno. Si el lich recibe daño de fuego o radiante, este rasgo no funciona al inicio del siguiente turno del lich. El liche muere sólo si comienza su turno con 0 puntos de vida y no se regenera.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: El liche tiene ventaja en las tiradas de salvación contra cualquier efecto que convierta a los muertos vivientes.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: Si el daño reduce al lich a 0 puntos de vida, debe hacer una tirada de salvación de Constitución con una DC de 5 + el daño recibido, a menos que el daño sea radiante o de un golpe crítico. Si tiene éxito, el lich queda reducido a 1 punto de vida.

action.name: Noxious Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9} para golpear, alcance de 5 pies, una criatura. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) de daño por veneno, y el objetivo debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de {@dc 17} Constitución o quedar {@condition poisoned} durante 1 minuto. El {@condition poisoned} objetivo puede repetir la tirada de salvación al final de cada uno de sus turnos, terminando el efecto sobre sí mismo si tiene éxito.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: El lich lanza uno de sus cantrips.

legendary.name: Noxious Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: El lich utiliza Toque Nocivo.

legendary.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Cada criatura en un radio de 30 pies del liche debe realizar una tirada de salvación de {@dc 17} Constitución, recibiendo 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de daño necrótico si falla la tirada de salvación, o la mitad de daño si tiene éxito.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: El druida es un hechicero Gruul de nivel 12. Su habilidad de hechizo es Sabiduría (salvación de hechizo {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} para golpear con ataques de hechizo). Tiene preparados los siguientes conjuros de druida:

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: El druida inflige el doble de daño a objetos y estructuras.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: El druida puede comunicarse con las bestias y las plantas como si compartieran un lenguaje.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de daño por apaleamiento, o 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de daño por apaleamiento si se usa a dos manos.

monster.name: Felidar
languages: understands Celestial and Common but can't speak

trait.name: Bonding
entries: El felidar puede vincularse mágicamente con una criatura que pueda ver, justo después de pasar al menos 1 hora observando a esa criatura mientras está a 30 pies de ella. El vínculo dura hasta que el felidar se une a una criatura diferente o hasta que la criatura vinculada muere. Este vínculo tiene los siguientes efectos: El felidar y la criatura vinculada pueden comunicarse telepáticamente entre sí a una distancia de hasta 30 metros. El felidar puede sentir la dirección y la distancia a la criatura vinculada si están en el mismo plano de existencia. Como acción, el felidar o la criatura vinculada pueden sentir lo que el otro ve y oye, durante lo cual pierde su propia vista y oído. Este efecto dura hasta el inicio de su siguiente turno.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: El felidar tiene ventaja en los chequeos de Sabiduría (Percepción) que dependen del oído o la vista.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: Si el felidar se mueve al menos 6 metros en línea recta hacia una criatura y la golpea con un ataque de garras en el mismo turno, ese objetivo debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de Fuerza {@dc 15} o ser derribado {@condition prone}. Si el objetivo es {@condition prone}, el felidar puede realizar un ataque de garras contra él como acción adicional.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El felidar realiza dos ataques: uno con su mordida y otro con sus garras.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) de daño perforante.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) de daño cortante.

variant.name: Winged Felidars
entries: Algunos felidares cuentan con enormes alas emplumadas. Un felidar alado utiliza el mismo bloque de estadísticas que un felidar normal, con el añadido de una velocidad de vuelo de 40 pies.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The firefist is a 9th-level Boros spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The firefist makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Guided Attack (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the firefist or one creature it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll, the firefist grants a +10 bonus to that roll.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The angel's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). The angel can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Flyby
entries: El ángel no provoca un ataque de oportunidad cuando vuela fuera del alcance de un enemigo.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: El ángel tiene ventaja en las tiradas de salvación contra hechizos y otros efectos mágicos.

trait.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the angel takes 21 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The angel makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) slashing damage, or 11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 22 ({@damage 5d8}) fire or radiant damage (angel's choice).

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The blastseeker's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The blastseeker can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components other than its Izzet gear, which doesn't function for others:

trait.name: Fluxbending Overcast {@recharge 5}
entries: The blastseeker can create an additional effect immediately after casting a spell. Roll a {@dice d6} to determine the effect: 1-3. The blastseeker teleports, swapping places with a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. 4-6. The blastseeker and each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) thunder damage.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de daño por apaleamiento, o 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de daño por apaleamiento si se usa a dos manos.

trait.name: Amplify Lightning
entries: Whenever a spell that deals lightning damage includes one or more fluxchargers in its area, the spell deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fluxcharger makes two slam attacks or uses Arc Lightning twice.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Arc Lightning
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) lightning damage, and lightning jumps from the target to one creature of the fluxcharger's choice that it can see within 30 feet of the target. That second creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d8}) lightning damage. Hit or Miss: The fluxcharger takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage after resolving the attack.

trait.name: Fear Frenzy
entries: The horror has advantage on attack rolls against {@condition frightened} creatures.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Frightening Screech {@recharge 5}
entries: The horror screeches. Each creature within 30 feet of it that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of it for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the horror's Frightening Screech for the next 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The medic is a 3rd-level Boros spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}). The medic has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The blastseeker's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The blastseeker can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components other than its Izzet gear, which doesn't function for others:

trait.name: Galvanic Overcast {@recharge 5}
entries: When the blastseeker casts {@spell lightning bolt} or thunderwave, it can roll a die. On an odd number, the blastseeker takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) force damage. On an even number, the spell also deals 9 ({@damage 2d8}) lightning damage to each target that fails its saving throw.

trait.name: Heart of the Storm
entries: When the blastseeker casts {@spell lightning bolt} or thunderwave, all other creatures within 10 feet of the blastseeker each take 3 lightning damage.

trait.name: Gust-Propelled Leap
entries: The blastseeker can use a bonus action to fly up to 10 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the galvanice weird dies, it explodes in a burst of ice and lightning. Each creature within 10 feet of the exploding weird must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) lightning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or lose the ability to use reactions until the start of the weird's next turn.

trait.name: Death Link
entries: If its specter rider is reduced to 0 hit points, the gloamwing is destroyed.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The gloamwing doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the gloamwing has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gloamwing makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The shaman is an 8th-level Golgari spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The shaman has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The shaman has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put it to sleep.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Fungal Rot
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage, and the target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Feed on Death
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the shaman drops to 0 hit points, the shaman gains 5 ({@dice 1d10}) temporary hit points.

trait.name: Vigilant
entries: The giant can't be surprised.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes three spear attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) piercing damage, or 20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

reaction.name: Protection
entries: When an attacker the giant can see makes an attack roll against a creature within 10 feet of the giant, the giant can impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The horncaller's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}). The horncaller can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Speak with Beasts
entries: The horncaller can communicate with beasts as if they shared a language.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The horncaller makes two melee attacks with its staff and uses One with the Worldsoul.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

action.name: One with the Worldsoul
entries: The horncaller chooses one beast it can see within 30 feet of it. If the beast can hear the horncaller, the beast uses its reaction to make one melee attack against a target that the horncaller can see.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hybrid can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hybrid makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hybrid makes two javelin attacks. It can replace one javelin attack with Spit Acid.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spit Acid
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) acid damage.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the hybrid poisoner has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the hybrid scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Poisonous Skin
entries: Any creature that touches the hybrid or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Toxic Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. At the end of each of the {@condition poisoned} target's turns, it must repeat the save, taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or ending the effect on itself on a successful one.

trait.name: Electrified Body
entries: Any creature that touches the hybrid or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning damage.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The hybrid sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hybrid makes two attacks: one with its shocking touch and one with its tentacles.

action.name: Shocking Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 11}), and the hybrid pulls the target up to 15 feet straight toward it. Until this grapple ends, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning damage at the start of each of its turns, and the hybrid shocker can't use its tentacles on another creature.

trait.name: Chameleon Skin
entries: The hybrid has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The hybrid can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hybrid makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Indentured Spirit
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Isperia's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 23}). Isperia can innately cast {@spell imprisonment} twice per day, requiring no material components.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Isperia is a 15th-level Azorius spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 23}, {@hit 14} to hit with spell attacks). Isperia has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: Isperia is immune to any effect that would sense her emotions or read her thoughts, as well as any divination spell that she refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain her intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Isperia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Isperia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Isperia makes two claw attacks. She can cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action in place of one claw attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 23} Wisdom saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage after each attack it makes against Isperia before the start of her next turn.

action.name: Supreme Legal Authority
entries: Isperia chooses up to three creatures she can see within 90 feet of her. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 23} Intelligence saving throw or Isperia chooses an action for that target: Attack, Cast a Spell, Dash, Disengage, Dodge, Help, Hide, Ready, Search, or Use an Object. The affected target can't take that action for 1 minute. At the end of each of the target's turns, it can end the effect on itself with a successful {@dc 23} Intelligence saving throw. A target that succeeds on the saving throw becomes immune to Isperia's Supreme Legal Authority for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: Isperia makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Isperia casts a spell of 3rd level or lower from her list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

legendary.name: Supreme Legal Authority (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Isperia uses Supreme Legal Authority.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Jarad is a 14th-level Golgari spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). Jarad has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Jarad fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Jarad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Jarad regains 25 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. He dies only if he starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Spore Infusion
entries: Jarad is surrounded by a cloud of spores. As a bonus action, he can cause the spores to deal 11 ({@damage 2d10}) poison damage to a creature he can see within 10 feet of him.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: Jarad has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces Jarad to 0 hit points, he must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, he drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Jarad makes two attacks: one with his Noxious Touch and one with his Staff of Svogthir. He can cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action in place of one of these attacks.

action.name: Noxious Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}28 ({@damage 8d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Staff of Svogthir
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage and 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: Jarad casts one of his cantrips.

legendary.name: Noxious Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Jarad uses Noxious Touch.

legendary.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 30 feet of Jarad must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kraul's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). The kraul can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Feed on Death
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the kraul drops to 0 hit points, the kraul or another creature of its choice within 30 feet of it gains 5 ({@dice 1d10}) temporary hit points, provided the kraul isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Hive Mind
entries: The kraul is immune to the {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other kraul.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kraul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kraul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The kraul can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kraul makes one attack with its quarterstaff and casts one of its spells with a casting time of 1 action.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

monster.name: Kraul Warrior
languages: understands Common but can't speak it

trait.name: Hive Mind
entries: The kraul is immune to the {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other kraul.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kraul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kraul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The kraul can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

variant.name: Winged Kraul Warriors
entries: Some kraul warriors have a flying speed of 40 feet, as a result of possessing gossamer wings. Their wings give them a higher station among the kraul soldiers. Winged kraul warriors serve the guild as scouts and shock troops.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lawmage is an 8th-level Azorius spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The lawmage has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Lazav's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 20}). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Elusive
entries: No attack roll has advantage against Lazav unless he is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Lazav fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Shapechanger Savant
entries: Lazav can use a bonus action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid he has seen. His statistics, other than his size, are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

trait.name: Psychic Defenses
entries: Unless Lazav is {@condition incapacitated}, he is immune to magic that allows other creatures to read his thoughts, determine whether he is lying, know his alignment, or know his creature type. Creatures can telepathically communicate with Lazav only if he allows it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Lazav makes three shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d6 + 7}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage, and the target has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before Lazav's next turn.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Lazav makes a weapon attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Lazav casts one of his innate spells.

legendary.name: Shifting Nightmare (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Lazav rapidly takes the form of several nightmarish creatures, lashing out at all nearby. Each creature within 10 feet of Lazav must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 18 ({@dice 4d8}) damage of a type chosen by Lazav: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or necrotic.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The master's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). The master can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Aura of Blood Lust
entries: When any other creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the master, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw, or it must immediately take the Attack action, making one melee attack against a random creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, it makes a ranged attack against a random creature within range, throwing its weapon if necessary.

trait.name: Feed on the Crowd
entries: Whenever a creature within 60 feet of the master dies, the master gains 15 temporary hit points and has advantage on all attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The master has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The master makes two melee attacks with its spear.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Captivating Presence {@recharge}
entries: Each creature within 120 feet of the master must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the master for 1 hour. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature's speed is 0. If the {@condition charmed} creature takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Captivating Presence of all masters of cruelties for the next 24 hours.

monster.name: Mind Drinker Vampire
languages: the languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The vampire's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the vampire can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the vampire has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is {@condition grappled} by the vampire, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. The vampire can also grapple the target (escape {@dc 13}) if it is a creature and the vampire has a hand free.

action.name: Mind Siphon {@recharge 5}
entries: The vampire targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 14} Intelligence saving throw, with disadvantage if the vampire has previously consumed the target's blood. On a failed save, the target takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) psychic damage, and the vampire discerns the target's surface emotions and thoughts. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and the vampire discerns the target's general emotional state but not its thoughts.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The mage's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: The mage wears a {@item Spies' Murmur|GGR|spies' murmur} (see chapter 5).

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Mount
entries: If the specter isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto its gloamwing mount, provided the specter and the gloamwing are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the specter appears astride the gloamwing along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not {@condition incapacitated}, the specter can't be surprised, and both it and its mount gain advantage on Dexterity saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The specter makes two scythe attacks.

action.name: Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Mind Twist {@recharge 5}
entries: The specter magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 5d8}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. The {@condition stunned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Reap Memory (3/Day)
entries: The specter touches one {@condition incapacitated} creature and chooses 1 hour from among the past 24. Unless the creature succeeds on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw, the creature loses all memory of that hour. The creature regains the memory only if the specter dies within the next 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Niv-Mizzet is a 20th-level Izzet spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 26}, {@hit 18} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Niv-Mizzet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Locus of the Firemind
entries: Niv-Mizzet can maintain concentration on two different spells at the same time. In addition, he has advantage on saving throws to maintain concentration on spells.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Niv-Mizzet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Master Chemister
entries: When Niv-Mizzet casts a spell that deals damage, he can change the spell's damage to cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Niv-Mizzet makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d8 + 9}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d4 + 9}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Niv-Mizzet exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 ({@damage 26d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: Niv-Mizzet casts one of his cantrips.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: Niv-Mizzet makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Niv-Mizzet beats his wings. Each creature within 15 feet of him must succeed on a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 2d4 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. Niv-Mizzet can then fly up to half his flying speed.

legendary.name: Dracogenius (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Niv-Mizzet regains a spell slot of 3rd level or lower.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The cyclops has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cyclops makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Spell Vitalization
entries: Immediately after a creature casts a spell of 1st level or higher within 120 feet of the cyclops, the cyclops can move up to twice its speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It can then make one slam attack against a target of its choice.

monster.name: Obzedat Ghost

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ghost's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
will: {@spell chill touch} (at 5th level, and the ghost regains hit points equal to half the amount of damage the target takes)

trait.name: Council of Five
entries: The ghost has a trait based on who it is, as shown below:

items.name: Enezesku: Enfeebling Ray
items.entry: Enezesku's Innate Spellcasting trait includes {@spell ray of enfeeblement}, which he can cast at will.

items.name: Fautomni: Undead Fortitude
items.entry: If damage reduces Fautomni to 0 hit points, he must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, Fautomni drops to 1 hit point instead.

items.name: Karlov: Unnatural Vigor
items.entry: When Karlov regains hit points, he has advantage on attack rolls he makes on his next turn.

items.name: Vuliev: Teleportation
items.entry: Vuliev's Innate Spellcasting trait includes {@spell misty step}, which he can cast at will.

items.name: Xil Xaxosz: Lingering Spite
items.entry: When Xil Xaxosz is reduced to 0 hit points, his incorporeal form explodes in a burst of necrotic energy. Each creature within 5 feet of him must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the ghost fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage, and the ghost regains hit points equal to half the amount of damage the target takes. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

action.name: Convene the Ghost Council
entries: The ghost summons the other four members of the Obzedat. At the start of the ghost's next turn, the other members appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the summoner. The ghosts each roll initiative when they appear.

legendaryHeader: If five Obzedat ghosts are all within 30 feet of each other, they can collectively take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time, and only at the end of another creature's turn. Obzedat ghosts regain spent legendary actions at the start of the turn of the ghost with the highest initiative.

legendary.name: Forced Obedience
entries: A target that all of the Obzedat ghosts can see must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or bow until the end of its next turn. Until this bow ends, the target can't take actions or reactions, and its speed is 0 and can't be increased.

legendary.name: Indentured Spirits (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The Obzedat ghosts conjure {@dice 1d6} {@creature indentured spirit|ggr|indentured spirits} (described in this chapter) within 60 feet of one of them.

trait.name: Focus
entries: As a bonus action, the giant can target a creature it can see within 30 feet of it and make that creature its focus. The target remains the giant's focus for 1 minute, or until either the target or the giant drops to 0 hit points. When the giant makes an attack roll against its focus, it adds a {@dice d4} to its attack roll. If the giant attacks a different target while it has a focus, it subtracts a {@dice d4} from its attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) slashing damage. If the Orzhov giant scores a critical hit, it rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mage's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}). It can cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Glimpse the Temporal Flood {@recharge 5}
entries: The mage targets one creature within 120 feet of it that it can see. The target takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage, and it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Precognitive Insight (3/Day)
entries: When the mage or a creature it can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, the mage can cause the roll to be made with advantage or disadvantage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Rakdos's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 25}). He can innately cast {@spell hellish rebuke} (at 5th level) at will, requiring no material components.

trait.name: Captivating Presence
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of Rakdos must make a {@dc 25} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition charmed} by Rakdos for 1 minute or until the creature is farther than 30 feet away from him. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to Rakdos's Captivating Presence for 24 hours.

trait.name: Cruel Entertainment
entries: When a creature Rakdos can see within 60 feet of him is reduced to 0 hit points, Rakdos gains 25 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Rakdos fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Rakdos has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Rakdos's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Rakdos makes two attacks with his Curtain-Call Scythe or his claws.

action.name: Curtain-Call Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) slashing damage.

legendary.name: Sadistic Revelry
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of Rakdos that is his ally or is {@condition charmed} by him must use its reaction to move up to half its speed toward the creature closest to it that it can see, provided it isn't already within 5 feet of that creature. It then must make one melee attack against that creature if it is able to do so.

legendary.name: Scythe (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Rakdos uses Curtain-Call Scythe.

legendary.name: Touch of Pain (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Rakdos makes a claw attack against one creature within 10 feet of him. The target must succeed on a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the creature can't maintain concentration on a spell or any other effect that requires concentration. The {@condition poisoned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lampooner is a 4th-level Rakdos spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following bard spells:

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Nimble
entries: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The juggler makes three dagger attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Nimble
entries: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fire eater makes two attacks with its bladed chain.

action.name: Bladed Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} para golpear, alcance de 10 pies, un objetivo. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de daño cortante.

action.name: Spew Flame {@recharge 4}
entries: The fire eater exhales flames. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Nimble
entries: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The acrobat makes two attacks with its barbed pole.

action.name: Barbed Pole
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the acrobat can jump up to 20 feet. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The reckoner is a 5th-level Boros spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). The reckoner has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: First Strike
entries: The reckoner has advantage on initiative rolls.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

reaction.name: Lightning Backlash {@recharge 5}
entries: When a creature hits the reckoner with an attack, the attacker takes lightning damage equal to half the damage dealt by the attack.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the stalker has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn yet.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The stalker can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Ruin Dweller
entries: The stalker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in ruins, and its speed is not reduced in {@quickref difficult terrain||3} composed of rubble.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The stalker deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The stalker makes three attacks with its shortsword.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk m} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Explosive Tank
entries: When the guard dies, or if it rolls a 1 when checking whether its Scorchbringer action recharges, the tank on its back explodes in a 10-foot radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the scorchbringer.

action.name: Light Hammer
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Scorchbringer {@recharge 4}
entries: The guard's scorchbringer spouts a stream of flame in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Self-Sacrifice
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the thrull is hit by an attack, the thrull swaps places with that creature and is hit instead.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The horror can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the horror can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shadow Stride
entries: As a bonus action, the horror can step into a shadow within 5 feet of it and magically appear in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of a second shadow that is up to 60 feet away. Both shadows must be cast by a Small or larger creature or object.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The horror makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the horror until the end of the target's next turn.

action.name: Lashing Shadows {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the horror, except other horrors, must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sire's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). The sire can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Aura of Mind Erosion
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the sire must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature has disadvantage for 1 minute on Wisdom and Charisma checks and on Wisdom and Charisma saves. At the start of each of its turns, the sire can suppress this aura until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The sire has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sire makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) piercing damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) slashing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The horror can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The horror can use its Maddening Presence and make three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Maddening Presence
